description: This file defines the interface for the DobbySpecGenerator class, which is responsible for generating runtime specifications (likely in JSON format) for container or application configurations within the WPEFramework plugin environment. It includes methods for creating environment variables, mounts, plugins, and other components of the runtime spec, and references various configuration and runtime components.

classes.name: DobbySpecGenerator
classes.description: A class responsible for generating JSON-based runtime specifications for container configurations based on application and runtime settings.

methods.name: generate
methods.description: Main method to generate the runtime spec JSON string based on application configuration and runtime configuration.

methods.name: createEnvVars
methods.description: Creates environment variables JSON object for the runtime spec.

methods.name: createMounts
methods.description: Creates mount points JSON array for the runtime spec.

methods.name: createRdkPlugins
methods.description: Creates RDK plugins configuration for the runtime spec.

methods.name: createMinidumpPlugin
methods.description: Creates configuration for the minidump plugin.

methods.name: createAppServiceSDKPlugin
methods.description: Creates AppService SDK plugin configuration.

methods.name: createNetworkPlugin
methods.description: Creates network plugin configuration.

methods.name: createBindMount
methods.description: Creates a bind mount specification for source and destination paths with options.

methods.name: shouldEnableGpu
methods.description: Determines whether GPU should be enabled based on configuration.

methods.name: getSysMemoryLimit
methods.description: Calculates system memory limit for the runtime environment.

methods.name: getGPUMemoryLimit
methods.description: Calculates GPU memory limit for the runtime environment.

methods.name: getVpuEnabled
methods.description: Checks if VPU (Video Processing Unit) is enabled in the configuration.

methods.name: getCpuCores
methods.description: Retrieves CPU core information as a string.

methods.name: populateClassicPlugins
methods.description: Populates plugin configurations into the spec based on application and runtime configs.

methods.name: createEthanLogPlugin
methods.description: Creates configuration for Ethan log plugin.

methods.name: createMulticastSocketPlugin
methods.description: Creates multicast socket plugin configuration.

methods.name: createIonMemoryPlugin
methods.description: Creates ion memory plugin configuration.

methods.name: createThunderPlugin
methods.description: Creates Thunder plugin configuration.

methods.name: createOpenCDMPlugin
methods.description: Creates OpenCDM plugin configuration.

methods.name: createPrivateDataMount
methods.description: Creates private data mount configuration.

methods.name: createFkpsMounts
methods.description: Creates FKP sources and mounts in the spec.

methods.name: createTmpfsMount
methods.description: Creates a tmpfs-mounted directory with options.

methods.name: createResourceManagerMount
methods.description: Creates a resource manager mount point.

methods.name: getWorkingDir
methods.description: Retrieves the working directory for the runtime spec.

methods.name: initialiseIonHeapsJson
methods.description: Initializes ion heap configuration JSON.

methods.name: encodeURL
methods.description: Encodes URLs for inclusion in the spec.

methods.name: addHolePunchPortToSpec
methods.description: Adds hole punch port mapping into the spec.
